section: The exclusive purpose of the Venture (the "Purpose") will be IT Development. internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service. This purpose may be changed at any time at the discretion of BorrowMoney.com, inc.
explanation: The exclusive purpose includes 'IT Development, internet Back office Maintenance And Deployment of medical Service'. By allowing BorrowMoney.com, inc. to change the purpose at its discretion, it undermines the mutuality of the venture. The other member, JVLS, LLC, entered the agreement based on the initial purpose, which could be changed without their consent, potentially making the venture no longer beneficial or even detrimental to them.

section: Any vote required by the Members will be determined such that each Member receives one vote, however, BorrowMoney.com, inc.'s vote will carry twice the weight of JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go's vote.
explanation: This creates a contradiction by giving BorrowMoney.com, inc. twice the vote. This means that BorrowMoney.com, inc. has power over JVLS, LLC. This creates an imbalance in decision-making and potentially disenfranchises JVLS, LLC, making it uncertain whether their interests will be adequately represented.

section: This Agreement may be amended with the consent of BorrowMoney.com, inc., notwithstanding any objection from JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go.
explanation: This introduces a contradiction by allowing BorrowMoney.com, inc. to amend the agreement unilaterally, regardless of JVLS, LLC's objections. This directly contradicts the principle of mutual consent required for amending contracts and gives BorrowMoney.com, inc. complete control over the agreement's terms, potentially to the detriment of JVLS, LLC.
